text: Snovik () is a small settlement in the Tuhinj Valley in the Municipality of Kamnik in the Upper Carniola region of Slovenia. Based on evidence from medieval sources, the name Snovik is derived from *Jesenovik 'ash grove'. The recently developed Snovik Spa is located near Snovik. It utilizes thermal water from the area with indoor and outdoor pools and offers a range of health programs, recreational activities, and accommodation.Slovenian Tourist Board site ==References== ==External links== *Snovik at Geopedia *Snovik Spa site Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Kamnik Category:Spa towns in Slovenia
title: Snovik
